author: mcconne
msg: Finished refactoring operations for the st.v21.core plugin

author: gkossakowski
msg: Enabled again a test that was failing due to bug in pooling mechanism. It passes now just fine.

author: gkossakowski
msg: Fixed bug in PoolableProxyHandler class that is responsible for putting components back to the pool. This bug could lead to the situation
when components that were not properly recycled landed in the pool.
This is a real fix that should be comitted in rr543066.
